author: *Ariana*
text: Send my baby to Space!! 🥰🌒Appreciate you!! #SendTips

author: *Ariana*
text: Can Twitter help decide next year’s theme for #MetGala ?? I think it should be the Climate Crisis. It’s important that celebrities bring awareness to this issue and I think they can use fashion as well as other methods, too!

author: *Ariana*
text: Today, is my #TwitterAnniversary! It’s been 13 years! 🥰 Even though, I really didn’t start Tweeting until about 2012/2013 so technically it’s my 10 year anniversary. 😊

author: *Ariana*
text: Do you remember when you joined Twitter? I do! #MyTwitterAnniversary https://t.co/N8niRov9nZ
